verbs.description: Rep. Marsha Blackburn [V: is] blaming " liberals " for President Donald Trump 's policy of separating migrant children from their parents at the border .
[ARG0: Rep. Marsha Blackburn] is [V: blaming] [ARG1: " liberals "] [ARG2: for President Donald Trump 's policy of separating migrant children from their parents at the border] .
